refnamediv.refpurpose: Modify the description of the selected point

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: btkSetPointDescription(h, index, desc) points = btkSetPointDescription(h, index, desc) [points, pointsInfo] = btkSetPointDescription(h, index, desc) btkSetPointDescription(h, label, desc) points = btkSetPointDescription(h, label, desc) [points, pointsInfo] = btkSetPointDescription(h, label, desc)

listitem.para: The handle used to represent an acquisition.
The index of the point (start from the value 1).
A non empty string to represent the label of the point.
A string to represent the new description of the selected point.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Modify the description of the selected point.
The format of the outputs points and pointsInfo are structures presented in details in the function btkGetPoints.
The acquisition is represented by the handle h. This handle is obtained by the use of a btk* function.
